## Welcome to the R4DS Online Learning Community!

The R4DS Online Learning Community is a community of learners at all skill levels working together to improve our data-science-related skills.

[Join our Slack community!](https://r4ds.io/join)

### Sponsorship

Would you like to support the R4DS Online Learning Community? You can make a tax-deductible donation to help us continue our work through the [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/r4ds).
